title: How many versions of the periodic table are there? - Quora

response.answer_text: “How many versions of the periodic table are there?” ALL the data on each element is identical everywhere in the universe. In this sense there is one, and ONLY one, periodic table of the elements. THe most common organization is not the only way to organize the table, though. I’ve seen about a dozen alternative forms. Most have specialty uses. They are good at illustrating one point.
